events.message: Applicant has submitted a personal loan request to cover upcoming medical expenses and consolidate some existing debts.
The loan application was categorised as a Personal Loan due to medical and debt repayment usage stated by the applicant.
Loan officer Sarah Thompson assigned to handle the personal loan application for follow-up and processing.
Initial review completed confirming completeness of application and eligibility for a personal loan covering debt consolidation.
Request for recent bank statements, medical bills, and proof of income has been sent to the applicant for verification purposes.
Applicant submitted all requested documentation including medical bills, pay stubs, and bank statements promptly.
Credit check was completed revealing some past credit card debts but no recent delinquencies or defaults.
Risk assessment concluded that the applicant’s profile has moderate risk due to prior credit history but adequate income.
Loan offer with a 7.5% interest rate and a 36-month repayment term was presented to the applicant for consideration.
Applicant responded positively accepting the terms of the loan offer and requesting next steps for finalization.
The personal loan application was approved by the committee following positive risk and credit assessment results.
Approved personal loan funds were successfully disbursed to the applicant’s designated bank account.
Follow-up with the applicant confirms receipt of funds and satisfaction with the loan process to date.
The loan application record was closed after successful funding and positive feedback from the applicant.
